name: Claim - The admin should be able to reject the employee's claim request, and the employee should be able to view the status of the claim request
fullName: Claim: Claim Tab functionality Claim - The admin should be able to reject the employee's claim request, and the employee should be able to view the status of the claim request
statusMessage:
`cy.request()` failed on:

https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/api/v2/pim/employees

The response we received from your web server was:

  > 422: Unprocessable Entity

This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.

If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`

-----------------------------------------------------------

The request we sent was:

Method: POST
URL: https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/api/v2/pim/employees
Headers: {
  "Connection": "keep-alive",
  "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/119.0.0.0 Safari/537.36",
  "accept": "*/*",
  "cookie": "orangehrm=4ad8e5db10ea8c2cf90a9c33c4a8873e",
  "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate",
  "content-type": "application/json",
  "content-length": 29
}
Body: {"firstName":"yIL-undefined"}

-----------------------------------------------------------

The response we got was:

Status: 422 - Unprocessable Entity
Headers: {
  "server": "nginx",
  "date": "Thu, 09 Nov 2023 21:39:03 GMT",
  "content-type": "application/json",
  "transfer-encoding": "chunked",
  "connection": "keep-alive",
  "cache-control": "no-cache, private",
  "x-content-type-options": "nosniff",
  "x-xss-protection": "1; mode=block"
}
Body: {
  "error": {
    "status": "422",
    "message": "Invalid Parameter",
    "data": {
      "invalidParamKeys": [
        "lastName"
      ]
    }
  }
}


Because this error occurred during a `before each` hook we are skipping the remaining tests in the current suite: `Claim: Claim Tab functionality`
